alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 10 at 2:47PM AKST until February 11 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Northeast winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
